content.stimulus_en: She (go to) ________ buy a car.
They (not/go to) ________ stay here.
We (go to) ________ start a course.
Is he ________ (go to) visit us?
I (go to) ________ travel next summer.
What ________ you going to do?
She is going to study medicine at university.
Are going you to join the gym?
They are not going to go on holiday this year.
He going is to look for a new job soon.
We are going to move to a bigger house next month.
I'm to going learn how to cook Japanese food.
A future or related word for Plan is '________'.
